Comments_List:
-Critical reading of texts from multiple disciplines and analyzing them 
-Engaging in discussion around the readings in a productive way 
-Developing an argument and improving essay writing

Strengths:
-Selection of readings and topics was incredible - I really enjoyed how the readings drew from various disciplines and how there were supplementary readings given each week as well. 
-Structure of the course - I think the course was organized in a way that spread the work load very well and emphasized the readings and the discussion.

I would definitely recommend this course, the readings were incredibly interesting and the topic of post-truth is relevant to current affairs which makes it useful for analyzing what happens in the news. Since the theory in the class was not strictly anthropology, this course would be great for non-anthropology majors as well.
